posts.post_content:
Hello Folks,

I'm looking for a nice VGEX-EX Drum T206 card have plenty of trade bait and of course cash if needed. Decided to let the Griffith in REA pass decided didn't need a HOF example just a nice clean common.

If you have one let me know the worst that happens is we chat even if we can't make a deal.

Cheers,

John
Total long shot but bump I guess.
John - I have a nice VG-Ex Coupon Type 1 example that has your name all over it! :)  (I can't help you on the drum, but I can bump this thread one more time for you - Consider it my contribution)
